skillTree.name: Chron's Wrath
skillTree.description: The Great Hound of War thirsts eternally for blood and slaughter, its rage manifesting itself in the unstoppable martial spirit of its warriors.

effects.description: Charge bonus: +12
Charge bonus: +30

skillTree.name: Brass Collar
skillTree.description: Few magics can worm their way through this one's skull; their Khornate collar offers adequate protection, as does the impenetrable, relentless fury infecting his mind.

effects.description: Spell resistance: 10%

skillTree.name: Thick Skin
skillTree.description: At times, this servant of Khorne storms across the battlefield with arrows lodged in his chest. However, they seem to do little but further stoke the raging fire of his wrath.

effects.description: Missile resistance: 10%

skillTree.name: Drinker of Blood
skillTree.description: Dining upon the blood of slaughtered enemies may attract the notice, and maybe the favour, of the Hound.

effects.description: Melee attack: +6
Melee attack: +12
Armour-piercing weapon damage: +15

skillTree.name: Voice of the Dark Gods
skillTree.description: This Lord speaks with a dread booming voice - a gift from his Dark Masters to ensure obedience.

effects.description: Leadership aura size: +40%

skillTree.name: Aura of Chaos
skillTree.description: The shadow of the Ruinous Powers looms large, protecting those who bear their mark.

effects.description: Missile resistance: 10%

skillTree.name: Hearts of Iron
skillTree.description: The followers of Chaos need not to rest, they march on with iron hearts desperate to harvest souls.

effects.description:
Vigour loss reduction: -15%
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Chosen Destroyer
skillTree.description: The chosen of the Blood God leave burning cities in their wake, exerting Khorne's savage dominion over the mortal plane.

effects.description:
Khorne Authority: +2
	(Lord's army)

Slaanesh Authority: -2
	(Lord's army)

Khorne Authority: +3
	(Lord's army)

Slaanesh Authority: -2
	(Lord's army)

Khorne Authority: +4
	(Lord's army)

Slaanesh Authority: -4
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Mentor
skillTree.description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +20%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +35%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +50%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Axe of Khorne
skillTree.description: This blood-forged axe is a sign of Khorne's favour, and unerringly severs heads with bloody sweeps so that yet more skulls might be laid at Khorne's feet.

effects.description: Ability: "Axe of Khorne"

skillTree.name: Bloodskull Pendant
skillTree.description: The bearer wears around his neck a tiny brass skull filled with the blood of a Daemon Prince of Khorne. When the Bloodskull's contents are tasted, the bearer becomes a maelstrom of violence.

effects.description: Ability: "Bloodskull Pendant"

skillTree.name: Blood Fever
skillTree.description: Haargroth's frenzy in the name of Khorne is such that a cloud of ruddy mist surrounds him, inducing an uncontrollable fury in everyone nearby.

effects.description: Ability: "Blood Fever"

skillTree.name: Jarl of the Graeling
skillTree.description: Haargroth's victories are beyond counting, and the plunder he has reaped from his raids has made the Graelings wealthy, and made many flock to his banner.

effects.description:
Upkeep: -10% for Khorne Marked units
	(Lord's army)

Recruit rank: +1 for Khorne Marked units
	(Lord's army)

Recruitment cost: -10% for Khorne Marked units
	(Lord's army)

Upkeep: -20% for Khorne Marked units
	(Lord's army)

Recruit rank: +2 for Khorne Marked units
	(Lord's army)

Recruitment cost: -20% for Khorne Marked units
	(Lord's army)

Upkeep: -30% for Khorne Marked units
	(Lord's army)

Recruit rank: +3 for Khorne Marked units
	(Lord's army)

Recruitment cost: -30% for Khorne Marked units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Blooded Champion
skillTree.description: Lost completely to the unholy fury that dwells in the blood of his people, Haargroth is a blood-maddened slaughterer, representing his foul deity in pure microcosm.

effects.description: Armour: +25
Unit mass: +25%
Ability: "Gorefeast"

skillTree.name: Spelleater Shield
skillTree.description: The Spelleater Shield is made from daemonhide stretched across a framework made from the bones of a Liche, its surface heavily adorned with symbols of power. When spells are cast against the bearer, it drains away their power.

effects.description: Ability: "Spelleater Shield"

skillTree.name: Seal of Savagery
skillTree.description: A dedicated warrior of Khorne knows no joy but the thrill of battle and bloodshed.

effects.description:
Khorne Authority: +1
	(Lord's army)
Passive ability: "Icon of Endless War"

skillTree.name: Burning Brand
skillTree.description: What magic can penetrate the searing hatred within the minds of the Blood God's most brutal followers.

effects.description: Passive ability: "Paragon of Carnage"

ui_effects.description: Effect intensity increases with each nearby entity death.

effects.description:
Spell resistance: 10%
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Brutal Charge
skillTree.description: When a huge swathe of rage and violence descends upon the unready, very few survivors are left in its wake.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +5%
Charge bonus: +5

skillTree.name: Maim!
skillTree.description: No foe remains a threat once torn limb from bloody limb!

effects.description: Melee attack: +4
Weapon strength: +3%
Melee attack: +8
Weapon strength: +6%

skillTree.name: Kill!
skillTree.description: "KILL! KILL THEM ALL!"

effects.description: Melee defence: +4
Weapon strength: +3%
Melee defence: +8
Weapon strength: +6%

skillTree.name: Destroy!
skillTree.description: "Raze it all to the ground! Leave nothing standing!"

effects.description: Leadership: +4
Weapon strength: +3%
Leadership: +8
Weapon strength: +6%

skillTree.name: Slaughter!
skillTree.description: With every other thought squeezed from their mind, there is naught left of this one but the screaming song of slaughter.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +3%
Physical resistance: 5%
Weapon strength: +6%
Physical resistance: 10%
Ability: "Bloodthirst"

skillTree.name: Murder!
skillTree.description: Death, malice, butchery and murder – the enemies of Khorne shall have it all.

effects.description: Hit points: +5%
Weapon strength: +3%
Hit points: +10%
Weapon strength: +6%

skillTree.name: Hunt!
skillTree.description: "None shall run far! None shall be able to hide! All will come to sufferance!"

effects.description: Speed: +5%
Weapon strength: +3%
Speed: +10%
Weapon strength: +6%

skillTree.name: Cleave!
skillTree.description: "Modulistic terror – a vast, sadistic feast. The only way to exit is going piece by piece."

effects.description: Melee attack: +4
Weapon strength: +3%
Melee attack: +8
Weapon strength: +6%

skillTree.name: Crush!
skillTree.description: All will know agony, pulverised by the inescapable grip of the Blood God's hatred.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +3%
Charge bonus: +10
Weapon strength: +6%
Charge bonus: +20

skillTree.name: Greater Gate of Khorne
skillTree.description: The raging winds draw forth a Bloodthirster to savage the ill-omened opponents of the Murder Lord.

effects.description:
Army ability: "Greater Gate of Khorne"
	(all units in army)

skillTree.name: Dominating Presence
skillTree.description: A Chaos Lord dominates – lesser beings cringe from a being that is so intently under scrutiny from the Dark Gods.

effects.description:
Unit experience gain per turn: +75
	(Lord's army)
Character's aura leadership effect: +5

skillTree.name: Chaos Vanguard
skillTree.description: To the Northmen, there is no greater honour than to fight and perish under the gaze of the Gods.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +4 for all non-Daemonic infantry units
	(Lord's army)

Armour: +6 for all non-Daemonic infantry units

	(Lord's army)

Armour: +12 for all non-Daemonic infantry units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +8 for all non-Daemonic infantry units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Savage Bloodlust
skillTree.description: The Daemons of Chaos bay for blood, spurred on by a chorus of agonised screams.

effects.description:
Armour: +4 for all Daemonic melee units
	(Lord's army)

Armour: +8 for all Daemonic melee units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +8 for all Daemonic melee units
	(Lord's army)

Armour: +12 for all Daemonic melee units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +12 for all Daemonic melee units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Warp Fire
skillTree.description: As dark wings take to the skies and Daemon arrows bear down, the enemies of Chaos know their end is near.

effects.description:
Melee defence: +4 for all Daemonic missile and flying units
	(Lord's army)

Speed: +4% for all Daemonic flying units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +6 for all Daemonic missile and flying units
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +8% for all Daemonic missile units
	(Lord's army)

Speed: +6% for all Daemonic flying units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +8 for all Daemonic missile and flying units
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +12% for all Daemonic missile units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Hammer into Anvil
skillTree.description: Breaking bones and ending lives, the armies of Chaos strike like an unholy hammer crashing through their enemies' ranks.

effects.description:
Charge bonus: +6 for all non-Daemonic cavalry and chariot units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +6 for all non-Daemonic cavalry and chariot units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +6 for all non-Daemonic cavalry and chariot units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +8 for all non-Daemonic cavalry and chariot units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +12 for all non-Daemonic cavalry and chariot units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Monstrous Strength
skillTree.description: Hulks of pure muscle, held upright by unsullied hatred, can crush a man with a frightening lack of effort.

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +4% for all non-Daemonic war beasts, monstrous and monster units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +6% for all non-Daemonic war beasts, monstrous and monster units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +6 for all non-Daemonic war beasts, monstrous, and monster units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +10% for all non-Daemonic war beasts, monstrous and monster units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +8 for all non-Daemonic war beasts, monstrous, and monster units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Doomfire
skillTree.description: Subdue the enemy with savage fire, as flaming projectiles burn a trail across the sky.

effects.description:
Ammunition: +10% for all non-Daemonic missile cavalry and artillery units
	(Lord's army)

Ammunition: +15% for all non-Daemonic missile cavalry and artillery units
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +8% for all non-Daemonic missile cavalry and artillery units
	(Lord's army)

Ammunition: +20% for all non-Daemonic missile cavalry and artillery units
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +12% for all non-Daemonic missile cavalry and artillery units
	(Lord's army)
Ability: "Rally!"

skillTree.name: Legion of Doom
skillTree.description: The legions march forth under the Lord's inscrutable gaze, eager to kill for fear of his wrath.

effects.description:
Armour: +10 for all infantry units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +5 for all infantry units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Spell resistance: 20% for all infantry units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Speed & Malice
skillTree.description: The worthiest of Chaos' vanguard are blessed with the most elaborate mutations, which also enable them to move faster for longer.

effects.description:
Speed: +10% for all cavalry, chariots and flying units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +5 for all cavalry, chariots and flying units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Missile resistance: 15% for all cavalry, chariots and flying units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Freakish Mutations
skillTree.description: Mutations awarded by the Chaos Gods to their followers may look horrific to southerners, but such gifts are prized.

effects.description:
Leadership: +8 for all war beasts, monstrous and monster units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +5 for all war beasts, monstrous, and monster units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Ward save: 5% for all war beasts, monstrous and monster units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Malevolent Ranger
skillTree.description: To devastate one's enemies from afar is the key to controlling the battlefield.

effects.description:
Armour: +10 for all missile units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Reload time reduction: +10% for all missile units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Missile resistance: 15% for all missile units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Fight or Die!
skillTree.description: There is no other choice. There never was.

effects.description: Ability: "Fight or Die!"
Replaces: "Rally!"

skillTree.name: Route Marcher
skillTree.description: Those who know the land and its secrets will travel faster and further than the foes who don't.

effects.description: Campaign movement range: +5%

skillTree.name: Despoilers
skillTree.description: To despoil, to corrupt and ruin, to break the mortals and take their gods from them - this is what Chaos wants.

effects.description:
Income from raiding: +10%
	(Lord's army)

Income from raiding: +20%
	(Lord's army)

Income from sacking settlements: +5%
	(Lord's army)

Income from raiding: +30%
	(Lord's army)

Income from sacking settlements: +10%
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Serve or Die
skillTree.description: "You will serve me, wretch, or you will die, there is no other option."

effects.description:
Recruitment cost: -5%
	(Lord's army)
Unit Upgrades cost: -5% for all units

Recruitment cost: -10%
	(Lord's army)
Unit Upgrades cost: -10% for all units

Recruitment cost: -15%
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Devoted of Chaos
skillTree.description: No act of faith can rival reaving the souls of the slain; a dark and twisted offering in honour of the Ruinous Powers.

effects.description:
Increased experience gain: +10% for units when fighting against the Forces of Order
	(Lord's army)
Souls gained from battles: +10%

Increased experience gain: +15% for units when fighting against the Forces of Order
	(Lord's army)
Souls gained from battles: +15%

Increased experience gain: +20% for units when fighting against the Forces of Order
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Ruination
skillTree.description: "This stinking mortal Hold will fall, my masters have foreseen it. Bring them ruin!"

effects.description:
Attrition suffered by defender: +5% when laying siege or encircling

skillTree.name: Unholy Resilience
skillTree.description: This willing servant of the Ruinous Powers has a resilience that is beyond any mortal measure.

effects.description: Casualty replenishment rate: +30% for this Lord
Wound recovery time: -1

skillTree.name: Lightning Strike
skillTree.description: "The time to strike is now!"

effects.description: Enemy battle reinforcement time: +25%
Enemy battle reinforcement time: +50%
Enables lightning strike battles when reinforcements are present
Enemy battle reinforcement time: +50%

skillTree.name: Foetid Gallipot
skillTree.description: A pungent mix of fell unguents ensures the unholy vitality of one’s minions.

skillTree.name: Blessed by Evil
skillTree.description: For one fighting with the favour of the Ruinous Powers, glory and riches come naturally.

Post battle chance of stealing a magic item: +5%

skillTree.name: Premonition
skillTree.description: Visions cloud the mind, prophesising the arrival of the enemy and uncovering every shadow in which they lurk.

skillTree.name: Driven by Rage
skillTree.description: The fire of hate burns rapidly across the land, turning all in its path to ash and cinder.
